Questions.title: Question 1 : Look at the screenshot of Résacril. Where do you need to go to check if your activity has been validated or look at your future reservations?
Question 2 : Oh no! You booked a coaching session next week in Spanish by mistake! What do you do?
answers: Go and try to learn Spanish

Questions.title: Question 3 : What do you do if you realize you can’t make it to a session you booked the same day and can’t cancel on Résacril?
answers: Call your English teacher to explain
Write an email or a DM to someone at the CRIL to cancel

Questions.title: Question 4 : What do you need to do on Moodle for the CRIL?
answers: Fill in a report for each coaching session, within two days
Fill in a report for everything you do at the CRIL, immediately

Questions.title: Question 5 : In your opinion, why does the CRIL staff ask students to fill in the coaching reports on Moodle?
answers: To help students and coaches track difficulties and progress

Questions.title: Question 6 : You like the TV show Rick and Morty and believe it would be easier for you to participate in a CRIL conversation on this topic. What do you do?
answers: Perform a magic dance and hope for the best
Ask your friends to talk about it with you
Tell Marie or Louise from the CRIL so they can organize it

Questions.title: Question 7 : Choose the best description of the photo
answers: A grey and white cat is sitting on a chair, there is a pink/purple light in the background
A white cat is thinking about philosophical concepts
The cat in the photo loves you
A very cute cat is looking at a mouse

Questions.title: Question 8 : Watch the video (you can replay it if you want). What is the best description of the scene?
answers: Two friends are having tea together
The blonde woman is talking about her book
The woman who doesn’t wear glasses is asking questions

Questions.title: Question 9 : Why is the woman with brown hair writing in a notebook?
answers: She’s interviewing the one with the glasses
She’s taking notes for a class

Questions.title: Question 10 : Anna, the woman with the glasses, says about Val : “we hardly knew each other.” What does that mean?
answers: She knew him but wasn’t very close

Questions.title: Question 11 : Watch the video below for 10 seconds and fill in the blank : I can see a talented person, and remove the personality from the professional ------
Question 12 : Watch the video below for 5 seconds and fill in the blank : Is there someone else, someone better to --------- ------- on who you were before?
Question 14 : What does this English expression mean : Pigs might fly
answers: Un jour les cochons prendront l’avion
Quand les poules auront des dents

Questions.title: Question 15 : Final question : What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?
answers: An African or a European swallow?
